item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel rin po che'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba
item.coloph: ma ga d+ha gyi shar gyi phyogs/ b+haM ga la zhes bya ba'i yul/ bi kram pu ri'i gtsugs lag khang / sku khrungs mkhas pa chen po las/ a ba d+hU tI bar gyur pa'i/ gzhon nu zla bas mdzad pa yin/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po li la badz+ra la/ bod kyi lo tsA bsod nams rgyal mtshan ni/ ru pa dpyal la mkhan ni ser rtsa yis/ rnyed dang grags pa'i don du 'di ma bsgyur/ rang gi slob ma rnams kyis gsol ba btab nas/ phan pa'i bsam pa 'di don legs par bsgyur/gal te lhag chad 'ga' zhig yod srid na/ rgya dpe gzhan dang mkhas pa gzhan dag la/ da dung bdag nyid zhus gtugs legs par bgyid/ sgra yi ming dang rnam rtogs sna tshogs pas/ lo tsA gzhan gyis bcos pa ma mdzad cig /mnyan cing shes na 'di la bshad pa mdzad/ dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dka' 'grel rin po che 'i phreng ba zhes bya ba / slob dpon gzhon nu zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: gshin rje'i dgra nag po'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel
item.coloph: gshin rje nag po'i rnam 'grel ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba/ slob dpon pad+ma pA Nisa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi slob dpon pa ra me shwa ra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba rong zom chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: tshig gi snang ba grub pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyi mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta dA na kIrti dang / lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed nag po'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs/ slob dpon mkhas pa dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na kIrti dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/

item.tib: rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i bstod pa
item.coloph: rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i bstod pa slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta su ma ti kIrti dang / lo tsA ba mar do chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: gshin rje dgra'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga gshin rje gshed 'byung ba zhes bya ba
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed 'byung ba zhes bya ba slob dpon che po la li ta badz+ra'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po a mo g+ha badz+ra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba cog gru shes rab bla mas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: mchod rten bsgrub pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa
item.coloph: rgya gar gyi mkhan po la li ta badz+rasa mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: bsrung ba'i 'khor lo sgrub pa'i thabs
item.coloph: dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon nyin mor byed pa'i grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis/ rgya gar dpe phyi mo dang gtugs te gtan la bab pa'o/

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.coloph: gshin rje'i dgra nag po sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon g+ho Sha badz+ras mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bal po'i mkhan po su ma ti tsan+d+ra'i zhal snga nas dang /bod kyi lo tsA ba ban+de tshogs chag chung bas bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: dpal gshin rje'i gshed dgra nag po'i sgrub thabs 'khor lo'i don rgyas par bshad pa dang bcas pa
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje'i gshed dgra nag po'i thabs 'khor lo'i don rgyas pa bshad pa dang bcas pa slob dpon mi bskyod rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa 'di yongs su rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsaR+Ya tsan+d+ra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje'i gshed nag po sgrub pa'i thabs
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud bzhi brgya lnga bcu pa las/ mkhas pa rnams kyis gsol ba btab pas/ dge slong bsod snyoms pa ka ma la rak+shi ta zhes bya bas bsdus pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: maN+Dala gyi cho ga
item.coloph: oM badz+ra maN+Dala muH zhes bya ba ni maN+Dala gnyis gshegs su gsol ba'o/ /yi dam lha'i maN+Dala ni so so'i sgrub thabs kyi gzhung las shes par bya'o/ /slob dpon chen po rnyog med rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po a du la d+hasa dang / lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: maN+Dala gyi cho ga zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dngos kyi maN+Dala rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la rak+Shi tas/ /gshin rje gshed kyi rgyud bzhi brgya lnga bcu pa la brten nas maN+Dala gyi cho ga mdzad pa'o/ /lo tsA ba shrI pradz+nyA na kIrtisa bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: gshin rje'i dgra nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs ku mu da kha bye ba zhes bya ba
item.coloph: gshin rje'i dgra nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ ku mu ta kha bye ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon rin che 'byung gnas zhi ba'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /A tsaR+Ya bi nA ya tsan+d+ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i mdor bsdus pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed nag po dus mthar phyin pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed nag po'i dus mthar phyin pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhas pa chen po shrI paN+Di tas mdzad pa'o/ /rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtisa rang 'gyur du bsgyur pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtisa rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed rnam par snang mdzad kyi mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed nag por snang mdzad kyi mngon rtogs zhes bya ba/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas par grags pa dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon po dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtisa rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: 'od dpag tu med pa'i snying po 'dod chags gshin rje gshed sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: 'od dpag tu med pa'i snying po 'dod chags gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ slob dpon mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: gshin rje gshed rdo rje rnon po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed rdo rje rnon po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA kIrtisa rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: rdo rje sems ma bde ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: rdo rje sems ma bde ba sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa chen po mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon mar me mdzad pas mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: rdo rje bde rgyas dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: rdo rje bde rgyas dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so

item.tib: las kyi rdo rje gau r'i'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: rdo rje las gau rI'i sgrubs thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so

item.tib: rje btsun 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: rje btsun 'jam dpal gshen rje gshed mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po kriSh+Na paN+Di tas mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: sangs rgyas gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: sangs rgyas gshin rje gsed nag po'i sgrub thabs/ nA da ku be ra las byung pa'i don/ kun da na ke ri na bzhugs pa'i mkhas pa chen po rnal 'byor pa nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA kIrtis rang 'gyur di mdzad pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po ka ma la rak+Shi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtisa rang 'byur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: khro bo tho ba gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: khor bo tho ba gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dbyug pa gshin rje gshed rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dbyug pa gshin rje gshed rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po di paM ka ras mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtisa rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: ral gri gshin rje gshed gtum po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: ral gri gshin rje gshed gtum pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya rdzogs so

item.tib: padma gshin rje gshed shes rab bde ba can gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: pad ma gshin rje gshed shes rab bde ba can gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtisa rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs kyi maN+Dala gyi cho ga zhes bya ba
item.coloph: gshin rje gsheg po'i maN+Dala gyi cho ga zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /zangs gleng rnal 'byor nA ga bu ra yis/ rnal 'byor ma ka ra tri ta nyid la/ gu tsha rgyal ba'i bu nyid btang nas kyang / ta ru pa ri du khrod tshal nyid du/ rnal 'byor 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis 'khor lo nang / gsol btab rnal 'byor rnams kyi zhal ngo ru/ maN+Dala cho ga bsod snyoms pa yis byas/ ding sang rnal 'byor lta spyod ldan pa yis/ dus rnams rtag tu maN+Dala 'bad par rigs

item.tib: chos kyi sku'i snang ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba
item.coloph: rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka lA pa ma hA zhes bya bas mdzad pa/ mchod rten gyi cho ga rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA dz+nyA na yis rang 'gyur du byas pa'o//so ma pu ri gtsug lag khang chen du/ nag po zhabs zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ rnal 'byor tshe 'phos de ba ba la yis/ yab mchog d+harmA pA la 'das gyur pa'i/ ched du gsol btab rgyal po'i zhal snga ru/ mchod rten cho ga me tog tshal du mdzad/ spros bcas spros med tshul gyi lam mchog 'di/ deng sang rnal 'byor rnams kyis gdab par rigs/

item.tib: gshin rje gshed kyi ro bsreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed kyi ro bsreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga zhes bya ba
item.coloph: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rim pa slob dpon nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa
item.coloph: 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed khro bo chen po'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal rdo rje'i blos mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i 'khor lo bri ba'i cho ga
gshin rje dgra nag po zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.coloph: di ni gshin rje dgra nag po'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon kun tu bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /slob dpon don yod rdo rje yis/ legs par bsal byed sgrub thabs 'di/ bsgyur ba'i bsod nams grangs med dang / gzhan yang smon lam 'di btab pas/ rgyud dang sgrub thabs mi 'bral zhing / de yi man ngag rjes 'brang bas/ bdag dang gzhan dag sems can kun/ gshin rje gshed kyi zhal mthong shog/

item.tib: gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon 'gro bzang snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon la li ta badz+ra mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: 'o ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.coloph: dpal kriSh+Na ya ma a ri'i rgyud las/ 'o ma sgrub pa'i man ngag tu byas la/ A tsar yA dzi mu Da pA tA las mdzad pa/ 'o ma sgrub pa'i man ngag rdzogs so/ /A tsaR+Ya badz+ra pA Ni dang / lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i 'khor lo'i man ngag
item.coloph: gshed nag 'khor lo'i man ngag slob dpon chen po nag po d+hisa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /lo tsA ba dge slong chos rab kyis bsgyur/

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga
item.coloph: sbyin sreg gi cho ga slob dpon chen po la li ta badz+rasa mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: chi bdag yi dwags rgyal po'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: chi bdag yi dags rgyal po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: gshin rje gshed kyi lag pa'i mchod pa
item.coloph: lag pa'i mchod pa ni/ dA na shrI las bsgyur ba rdzogs so

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i dkyil 'khor gyi bstod pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyi dgongs pa nye bar bsdus pa la/ gshin rje gshe nad po'i dkyil 'khor gyi bstod pa/ a tsaR+Ya kIrtisa zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: rdo rje 'dzin pas gshin rje gshed po la bstod pa'i rgyud
item.coloph: rdo rje 'dzin pas gshin rje gshed po la bsod pa'i le'u'i rgyud las/ bstod pa'i le'u'o rdzogs so

item.tib: gtor ma nye bar sbyang ba
item.coloph: badz+ra at+ma ko ho zhes pas brdzod ma the bong dang srin lag

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud kyi dka' 'grel
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud kyi dka' 'grel/ rdo rje slob dpon mi bskyod pa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi nA ya tsan+d+ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong she rab kyi bsgyur cing zhu te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud kyi mdor bshad pa @zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed rnal 'byor gyi skabs kyi mdo mdor bshad pa rdzogs so/ /slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyi rjes su 'brangs pa'i slob dpon dpal chen po rdo rje grub pas mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed rgyud kyi mdo mdor bshad pa zhes bya ba
rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud kyi dka' 'grel
item.coloph: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal gzhon nu zla bas mdzad pa'i dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud chen po'i dka' 'grel rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po ta thA ga ta rak+Shi ta dang / lo tsA ba dge slong ba ri rin chen grags pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: ma he'i zhal gyi sgrub pa'i thabs
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rgyud gyi sgrub thabs slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po rnam pa snang mdzad bsrung pa'i zhabs dang lo tsA ba dge slong ba ri d+harma kIrtisa bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rdo rjes 'jigs byed zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.coloph: 'jam dpal dbyangs kyes rab mdzad pa phyag gnyis pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsaR+Ya A nan+da dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong rdo rje grags kyes bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs mdor bsdus pa
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs mdor bsdus pa/ slob dpon chen po shrI b+ha drasa mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bsnyen pa'i cho ga
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o/ /rdzogs so

item.tib: sgrub pa'i cho ga
item.coloph: sgrub pa'i cho ga slob dpon zhi ba'i ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa las 'khor lo bskor ba'i las drag po phyogs gcig pa
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jig byed kyi rtog pa las 'khor lo bskor pa'i las drag po phyogs gcig pa/ slob dpon zhi ba'i ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed sgrub pa'i thabs las bya ba'i cho ga sems dpa' bsdus pa
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po don yod rdo rje zhabs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs
item.coloph: slob dpon many+dzu shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa/ zhang 'or ston pa shes rab bsod nams kyis bsgyur ba rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed sgrub pa'i thabs dang las bya ba'i cho ga sems dpa' bsdus pa
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs/ AtsaR+Ya don yod rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /nyid kyi rang 'gyur ro/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shrI dz+nyA na dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba rong zom chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur cing slar yang phyug 'tshams dbang phyug rgyal pos bsgyur

item.tib: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
item.coloph: dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon chen po dpal don yod pa'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta de nyid dang / lo tsA ba rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed ma he'i gdong can dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs// slob dpon many+dzu badz+rasa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bal po'i paN+Di ta b+ha ro phyag rdum dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi tshogs kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dpal ldan rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi tshogs kyi 'khor lo/ slob dpon rat+na A ka shAn+tisa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM kara rak+Shi ta dang / lo tsA ba dge slong rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur pa'o

item.tib: tstshu tstshunda ra'i rtog pa
item.coloph: ts+tshu ts+tshuna da ra'i rtog pa rdzogs so/ /b+ha ro phyag rdum gyi phyag dpe las/ rwa rdo rje grags kyis phyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba
item.coloph: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi drag pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga a mo g+ha badz+rasa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rwa rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dpal rjo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon la li ta badz+ra'i zhabs kyi mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA tra shrI be de (ba) dang /bod kyi lo tsA ba cog gru ban+de shes rab bla mas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /sgrub pa'i slob dpon la li tas mdzad pa'o

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi gtor ma'i cho ga
item.coloph: slob dpon chen po la li ta badz+rasa mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: bhai ra ba'i zhi ba'i bya ba bdun pa
item.coloph: b+hai ra ba'i zhi ba'i bya ba bdun pa/ paN+Di ta a mo g+ha chung pas mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi drag po'i las kyi bya ba bdun pa dang rim pa bzhin du bya ba'i cho ga
item.coloph: rim pa bzhin du bya ba'i cho ga /dpal u rgyan yul du 'dug pa/ dregs pa can 'dul ba'i thabs nye tshe ba/ byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya'o/ /rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i 'khor lo'i cho ga
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i 'khor lo'i cho ga rdzogs so

item.tib: las kyi grogs kyis byed pa
item.coloph: gzhan la gus pas mchog tu bkur rdzogs so

item.tib: dam rdzas rmad du bsgyur te bsten pa'i cho ga
item.coloph: dam rdzas rmad du bsgyur te bsten pa'i cho ga rdzogs so

item.tib: gtam rgyud kyi rtog pa
item.coloph: gtam rgyud kyi rtog pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi phyag mtshan gyi rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: mkhas pa chen po ta thA ga ta rak+Shi tasa mdzad pa'o/ U to pa ti dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba mal gro blos (blo gros) kyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: slob dpon dz+nyA na ka ras mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bstod pa
item.coloph: rdzogs so

item.tib: de nyid lnga pa'i bstod pa
item.coloph: de nyid lnga pa'i bstod pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bstod pa
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bstod pa/ paN+Di ta don yod rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta de nyid dang / zhang lo tsA ba she rab bla mas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: 'jam dpal 'jigs byed mtshan gyi bstod pa
item.coloph: 'jam dpal 'jigs byed mtshan gyi bstod pa/ slob dpon las kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal gshin rje gshed po'i rtsa ba'i sngags don rdo rje rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jams dpal gyi rtog pa thams cad bsdus par 'gyur pa/ rdo rje rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga/ /zhib mo las slob dpon dpal ldan sged pa'i rdo rje yis/ /las dang dngos grub cho ge zhib mo slob dpon rigs bzang pos/ / de la phan pa'i le'u gcig mdzad pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gi mkhan po dpal u pa ya shrI mi tra dang / rong zom chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur te gtan la phab pa/

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs rdo rje 'od ces bya ba
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs rdo rje 'od ces bya ba/ /slob dpon chen po bai ro tsa na rak+Shi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /mkhas pa chen po bai tsa na rak+Shi ta de nyid dang/ /lo tsA ba glan d+harma ma tis sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab nas/ /bdag khyung po rnal 'byor pas/ /bi ka ma la shI la nyid du bla ma chen po de nyid dang / /lo tsA ba de nyid la mnyes par bsnyen nas zhus pa'o/ /man ngag dang dkyus 'di phrad nas nges par gtan la phab pas nyams su tshor ba yod do

item.tib: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga gsal ba
item.coloph: rgya gar gyi mkhas pa chen po paN+Di ta bai ro tsa na rak+Shi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta bai ro tsa na de nyid dang / lo tsA ba glan dar ma blo gros kyi bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po gdong drug pa'i 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po gdong drug pa'i 'khor lo'i bsgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa/ /slob dpon de ba A ka ra tsan+d+rasa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po de ba A ka ra tsa dra de nyid dang / /cog ro ban+de shes rab bla mas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/

item.tib: gshin rje'i dgra bsgrub pa'i 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dpal o rgyan gyis yul nas byung ba grub pa'i 'khor lo ji ltar rnyed pa klu'i byang chub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: 'jam dpal gyi rtog pa dam rdzas gsang ba rmad du bsgyur te bsten pa'i cho ga
item.coloph: 'jam dpal gyi rtog pa dam rdzas gsang ba rmad du bsgyur te bsten pa'i cho ga rdzogs so

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon shrI bi ru pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi phyogs kyi paN+Di ta dA na shi las rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'i sgrub thabs rnal 'byor kyi dbang phyug bi ru pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rje btsun chen po nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer gyis zhal snga nas dang / chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: 'od gsal 'char ba'i rim pa
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i man ngag 'od gsal 'char ba'i rim pa slob dpon mthu stobs kyi mgon po dpal bi ru pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta be ren+d+ra pa'i zhal snga nas dang / chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: shin tu spros pa med pa de kho na nyid kyi man ngag ces bya ba
item.coloph: shin tu spros pa med pa'i de kho na nyid kyi man ngag ces bya ba slob dpon dpal ldan mthu stobs kyis mgon po thugs spros pa med pa'i dbyings las ma gyos bzhin du/ /sku'i spros pa dpag tu med pas gdug pa can tshar bcod cing / /bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos su byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po bar+pi (bir+pasa) pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bstan pa bsrung pa'i lha rnams kyi bu gcig pa ltar bskyangs pas rgyal po gzhan gyi phyir rgol bas glags lta bar ma nus pa'i ljongs chos kyis rgyal po'i sku mkhar nyi pa gzugs su/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta dngos grub brnyes pa dpal d+har+pa Na A (tsaR+Ya)dang/ /glo bo lo tsA dge slong zhes rab rin chen gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga
item.coloph: dpal dpa' bo'i rgyal pos mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rje btsun nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer gyi zhal snga nas dang / chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/

item.tib: gshin rje gshed kyi 'phrul 'khor gyi phreng ba
item.coloph: dpal o rgyan nas 'byung ba gshin rje gsed dmar po'i rgyud chen 'bum phrag gsum las byung ba slob dpon bi ru pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta dpal mkhas pa chen po da na shI las/ yul dbus kyi grub pa thob pa'i gnas/ /drang srong srin po rir bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs paN+Di ta chen po rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug phyag rgya chen po grub pa grub thob kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta chen po rje rtsun nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer gyi zhal snga nas dang / lo tsA ba chags dge slong chos rje dpal gyis gus pas mnyan nas/ mang yul gyi bzo gnas chen por bsgyur cing zhus btan la phab pa

item.tib: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga paN+Di ta chen po rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal 'dzin gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta rje btsun chen po dpal gshin rje gshed kyis rjes su gzung ba/ /nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer gyi zhal snga nas dang / /chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: rnal 'byor bzhi'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba rang byin gyis brlab pa'i man ngag
item.coloph: rnal 'byor bzhi'i de kho na nyid cas bya bar rang byin gyis brlab pa'i man ngag grub thob kyis 'khor los sgyur ba mthu stobs la mngal brnyes pa/ dpal ldan rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bram ze dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /d+harma Na A tsaR+Ya dang / glo bo lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs//slob dpon chen po dpal 'dzin gyi mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /lha'i skad la legs par zhugs pa'i shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skang gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan nas/ dpal thar pa'i gling gi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o/ dpal ldan yon tan sgra yi chos//bzang po rtogs pa'i skad gnyis pa/ de yi dpe la bsgyur ba 'di/ mthar byed la mkhas skye bos zung/ sa'i steng du nyi zla ltar gyur cig/

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po maN+Dala du mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed dmar po maN+Dala du mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba'o//dpal 'dzin gyi mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /lha'i skad la legs par zhugs pa'i shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o/ /mkhas pa'i gtsug rgyan chos kyi bzang po yis/ /ma bsgyur de phyir de yi phyag dpe las//legs par bsgyur 'di de yi gsung rab la/ /dad pa'i blo ldan rnams kyis spyi bos long/ /sa yi steng du nyi zla ltar gyur cig/

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po dang gshin rje gshed dmar po'i mchod pa'i cho ga
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed nag po dang gshin rje gshed dmar po'i mchod pa'i cho ga/ slob dpon chen po paN+Di ta dpal/ dpal 'dzin gyi zhal nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer dang / chag chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi cho ga
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi cho ga slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po dA na shI las rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i gtor ma'i cho ga
item.coloph: gtor ma'i cho ga slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rje btsun chen po nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer dang / chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub pa'i thabs dpal rnam par snang mdzad srung bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rje btsun chen po nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer snga nas/ chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i man ngag dang bcas pa gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'i mngon par rtogs pa
item.coloph: rang byin gyi brlabs pa'i rim pa man ngag dang bcas pa gshin rje gshed dmar po'i mngon par rtogs pa rdzogs so//slob dpon chen po mkhas shin dngos grub brnyes pa/ blo gros bzang pos mdzad pa/ paN+Di ta chen po bla ma rje btsun nyi ma 'od zer gyis zhal nga nas/ gus pas mnyan nas chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i 'khrul 'khor gyi gsal byed
item.coloph: khor lo'i cho ga nye bar bsdus pa paN+Di ta rdo rje gdan pa nis ka lam ka'i zhal snga nas dang/ /dpyal lo tsA ba dpal chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: gshin rje dashed dmar po'i 'khor lo'i de kho na nyid kyi gsal byed
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed kyi las tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i de kho na nyid gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba/ sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta rdo rje gdan pa ni skal la(ma'i) ka'i zhal snga nas dang / dpyal lo tsA ba dpal chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: gshin rje dgra dmar po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: gshin rje dgra dmar yon tan 'byung gnas sgrub thabs chos/ /rgya gar dpe 'di bod kyi mi rtogs pas/ dam pa se tsa'i rig 'dzin skad gnyis pa/ chos kyi bzang po'i dpe las gus pas bsgyur/ /sa'i steng na nyi zla ltar gyur cig

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba
item.coloph: gshin rje dmar po'i rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba/ /mkhas pa chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i 'tsho ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i man ngag
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i 'tsho ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta d+hara paNa A tsaR+Ya'i zhal kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta dngos grub brnyes pa d+hara paNa A tsaR+Ya de nyid dang / glo bo lo tsA ba dge slong she rab rin chen gyis/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i sku mkhar nyi gsungs su bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'i byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa
item.coloph: gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa grub thob kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba bram ze dpal 'dzin gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+hara paNa A tsaR+Ya dang / glo bo lo tsA ba dge slong shes rab rin chen gyi bsgyur ba'o/ /bod du 'gyur ba'i byin rlabs kyi bka' la 'di las zab pa tshang ba byin brlabs che ba mnyan pa/ brgyud pa dang ldan pa med pas su thod thod (thong thong)la ma byin/ brnyen pa yongs su ma rdzogs na mkha' 'gro ma'i bka' chad 'ong bas shin tu mnyan/ rjes gnang ma thob par dpe 'dam ston a zhes bla ma rgya gar shar phyogs pa gsung / sku gsung thugs kyi rgya/

item.tib: lha mo 'od 'dzin ma'i byin gyis brlab pa
item.coloph: ting nge 'dzin gyi bcud len gyi byin gyi brlabs sgrub thob kyi bdag po mkhas pa chen po dpal 'dzin gyi mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po de ba A ka ra dang / lo tsA ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba las/ /dus phyis rgya gar shar phyogs paN+Di ta d+hara paNa A tsaR+Ya dang lo tsA ba dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa zhe sdang rdo rjes bsgyur cing zhus te slar dag par byas so/ /snga 'gyur la 'di tshan che tsam gda'o/ gsungs so

item.tib: 'od 'chang ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.coloph: 'od 'chang ma'i sgrub thabs ting 'dzin gyi bcud len gyi man ngag ting 'dzin la mnga' brnyes pa dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /lo pan snga ma dang 'dra/ 'di'i man ngag cig sngar yang snyan brgyud du byung 'dug ste/ /gzhung sngar ma 'gyur gsung

item.tib: rang gi sems gong du 'pho ba'i man ngag byin rlabs dang bcas pa
item.coloph: rang sems gong du 'pho ba'i man ngag slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyi gdams pa de nyid kyi mdzad pa'o/ /paN+Di ta rgya gar mngon shes can dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos khu bas bsgyur ba las/ phyis sa'i steng na 'gran zla dang bral ba d+hara paNa A tsaR+Ya dang / mdun lo tsA ba she rab rin chen gyi grong du bsgyur cing zhus pa'o

item.tib: byin gyis rlabs pa'i rim pa
item.coloph: pho ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos su byin gyis brlabs pa dpal 'dzin chen pos mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bla ma shar phyogs pa chen po d+hara paNa A tsaR+Ya dang / glo bo lo tsA ba dge slong pradz+nyA rat+nasa sku mkhar nyi gzungs su bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: me'i lha mchod pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i byed me'i cho ga zhes bya ba dpal 'dzin gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+hara paNa A tsaR+Ya dang dge slong shes rab rgyal tshan gyis mang yul du bsgyur cing zhus pa'o

item.tib: bdud rtsi byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: bdud rtsi byin gyi brlab pa'i rim pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal bi ru pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+hara paNa A tsaR+Ya dang / lo tsA ba zhe sdang rdo rjes mang yul gyi gtsug lag chen por zhus shing bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i byin brlabs dang phyir bzlog pa'i man ngag ces bya ba
item.coloph: phyir zlog pa'i man ngag gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed dmar po'i zhal gyi gdams pa//rnal 'byor gyi dbag phyug chen po dngos grub mchog brnyes pa'i dpal 'dzin gyi mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po a nu pa ma rak+Shi ta dang / lo tsA ba dar ma yon tan gyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o/ dus phyis chos kyi rgyal po'i sku mkhar nyi gzungs su//rgya gar shar phyogs kyi mkhas pa chen po dar paNa A tsaR+Ya dang//lo tsA ba blo bo shes rab rin chen gyis bsgyur cing zhus so/ /'di'i dpe skabs su rgya gar bal po thams cad du rgyun chad pa las phyis dbus rgyan mkha' 'gro ma brgya mtsho'i gos can las/ rnal 'byor sen ta wa len tas zhus te byung ngo

item.tib: las kyi gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po'i bsgrub thabs
item.coloph: las kyi gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po'i bsgrub thabs/ /slob dpon la li ta badz+rasa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bal po thugs rje chen po dang / bod kyi ban+de rwa lo tsA ba rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sngags btu ba zhes bya ba
item.coloph: 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sngags btu ba/ /slob dpon dpal 'dzin zhabs kyi mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta dA na shi la dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba bsod nams seng+gesa bsgyur ba'

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i las kyi phreng ba'i sgrub thabs yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba
item.coloph: longs spyod can ma'i rtogs pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dga' bas tshim ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dga' bas tshim ma zhes bya ba'i rtog pa rdzogs so

item.tib: gnod sbyin na Da pho mo'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: gnod sbyin na Da pho mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: gnod sbyin mo sa'i bdag mo bkra shis ma'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: gnod sbyin la sogs sgrub thabs kyi man ngag rdzogs so

item.tib: gnod sbyin dga' byed kyi sgrub thabs
item.coloph: gzhan yang las thams cad byed par 'gyur ba'i dga' byed ces bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po phur bus 'debs pa'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: kI li kI la zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: brdeg par byed pa'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon gyi sgrub thabs
item.coloph: di brdeg par byed pa'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon zhes bya ba'i rtogs pa rdzogs so/ /de bzhin du gzhan yang gnod sbyin rnams sgrub par bya'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sgrub thabs kyi man ngag cung zad bstan pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal zla ba'i lha mo zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: zla ba'i lha mo zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: phrog ma rna cha 'dzin ma'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: rna cha 'dzin pa'i a pa tsha ra'i sgrubs thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: rin chen phreng ba ma
item.coloph: a pa tsha ra'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: klu mo'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: klu mo'i zhal mtha' yas ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: klu mo nor skyong zhal ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: nor skyong ma'i sa ma pa thA/

item.tib: klu mo a phu zhes bya ba'i man ngag
item.coloph: klu mo'i sgrub thabs kyi man ngag cung zad bstan pa rdzogs so

item.tib: yid 'phrog ma'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: yid 'phrog ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: legs par dga' ma'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: legs par dga' ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: spyan yangs ma'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: spyan yangs ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: dod chags dga' ma'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dod chags dga' ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: byung po a pa rA dzi ta'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: lhag par rgyal ba mi pham ma'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: mi pham pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: gang ba bzang po'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: gang ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: byung mo mdzes ma'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: byung mo chen mo dpal mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal rgyal ba'i mdzes ma'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dpal rgyal ba'i mdzas ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: dri med mdzes ma'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dri med mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: sha za pi lu'i pa li sgrub thabs
item.coloph: pi lu pa la zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: sha za nor bu 'dzin pa'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: drug pa'i 'dre'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: sha za nag po'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dre nag po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: sha za nag po'i snying po'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dre nag po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: sha za mo ha na ma'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: ha na ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: a lu ka zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: a lu ka zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: a la sbas pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: a la gup+ta zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: bong bu'i gdong can ma'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: bung bu'i gdong can ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: sha za a lu mbi na'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: a lum pi ni zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: utstshuSHm'a zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: uts+tshuSh+mA zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: kSHu kSHu se yi kun da'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: k+Shu k+Shu se ri kun+da'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: sha za mo rna ba 'dzin pa'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: de nas gter ston pa dang / blo 'phel pa'i rdzes dang /gzhan yang 'dod pa tham cad ster ba dang / thams cad srung bar byed pa'i 'dre mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: sha za mo kha nag mo'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dre mo kha nag mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: gshin rje gshed kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed kyi yid bzhin kyi nor bu'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /rgya gar shar phyogs b+ha ga la'i paN+Di ta dA na shi la zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs pa drang srong srin po rir rang 'gyur du byas pa'o

item.tib: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa mtshan don gsal bar byed pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba
item.coloph: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa mtshan don gsal bar byed pa'i sgron me zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /slob dpon bi ma la mi tras mdzad nas thugs kyi sras nyang ting nge 'dzin gyis zhus pa'o//gnyegs gnya' nas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i don gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: grel pa rgyun gcod spu gri zhes bya ba dga' rab rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i nye bar bsdus pa'i rnam par rtog ge zhes bya ba
item.coloph: mtshan yang dag par brdzogs pa'i nye bar bsdus pa rnam par rtog ge zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po nges par sbyangs pa dpal gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po shrI badz+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dpal ser rtsa bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o/ /byang chung sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul gyi/ gnas mchog sman lung gtsug lag khang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i dbang ldan ma/ de dag don du legs par bsgyur

item.tib: nye bar bsdus pa'i rnam par rtog ge dang sbyar ba'i bsdus don mtshan gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba
item.coloph: 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba khri drug stong pa ting 'dzin dra ba'i le'u las/ 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa phan yon dang bcas pa'i bshad pa/ nor bu'i gling du 'khrungs pa dpal ldan byang chub mchog gi skal pa can/ dpal sna tshogs gzungs kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa/ /sngags don rnam par gzigs pa dang / de'i rjes su 'breng pa slobs dpon chen po gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa/ /nye bar bsdus pa'i rnam pa rtog ge dang sbyar ba'i bsdus don mtshan gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /pradz+nyA gu rus mdzad do

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa snying po mngan par rtogs pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par rjod pa'i 'grel pa snying po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po dpal gnyis med rdo rje mdzad pa rdzogs so//rnal 'byor pa chen po pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtisa rang 'gyur du byes pa'o

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/ /rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nya na kirtisa rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i rin po che'i phyag rgya dri ma med pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' rin po che'i phyag rgya dri ma med pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kirtisa rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mngon par rtogs pa
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/ rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kirtisa rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i rin po che'i phyag rgya dri ma med pa'i cho ga
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i rin po che'i phyag rgya dri ma med pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtisa rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: rang bzhin du gnas pa'i sngags kyi spyod pa bcu pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: rang bzhin du gnas pa'i sngags kyi spyod pa bcu pa zhes bya ba dpal ldan gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtisa rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: rmi lam brtag pa
item.coloph: rmi lam brtag pa/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su med pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtisa rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bsam gtan dug sel bar byed pa'i mar me zhes bya ba
item.coloph: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bsam gtan gyi dug sel pa'i mar me zhes bya ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtisa rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i yid 'jug pa'i bsam gtan gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba
item.coloph: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i yid 'jug pa'i/ bsam gtan gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gyis gnyis su med pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtisa rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: thig le grub pa
item.coloph: thig le grub pa/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtisa rang 'gyur mdzad pa'o

item.tib: thig le gcig pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: thig le gcig pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtisa rang 'gyur du mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i snying po grub pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i snying po grub pa zhes bya ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtisa mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: gdams ngag nye bar bsdus pa
item.coloph: slob dpon chen po shrI mai tri'i gdams ngag nye bar bsdus pa rdzogs so

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zab cing rgya che ba'i 'grel pa
item.coloph: dpal mai tri pas mdzad pa nye bar bsdus shing / zab cing rgya che ba'i 'grel pa/ mkhas pa chen po dril bu pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shrI sa twa dang / dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs zhi ba 'od kyi rim pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /sdom pa bzang po'i thugs dam/ lo tsA ba d+harmA b+hasa bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: 'jam dpal khro bo'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: 'jam dpal khro bo'i sgrub thabs rdo rje 'od kyi rim pa zhes bya ba/ /bla ma sdom pa bzang po'i thugs dam/ bla ma lo tsA ba d+harmA b+hasa bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rgyud kyi rgyal po 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
item.coloph: rgyud kyi rgyal po 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bla ma sdom pa bzang pos mdzad pa rdzog so

item.tib: skyabs 'gro sems bskyed dbang bzhi'i gdams pa
item.coloph: skyabs 'gro sems bskyed dbang bzhi'i gdams pa slob dpon sdom pa bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: rdo rje glu'i gdams ngag
item.coloph: rdo rje glu'i gdams ngag rdzogs so

item.tib: khrus kyi cho ga
item.coloph: rdzogs so

item.tib: gtor ma'i cho ga
item.coloph: gtor ma'i cho ga rdzogs so

item.tib: bdun tshigs kyi cho ga
item.coloph: sdom pa bzang pos mdzad pa 'bro lo tsA ba d+harmA b+hisa bsgyur ba ro'i rab gnas cho ga rdzogs so

item.tib: ro sreg pa'i cho ga
item.coloph: ro sreg pa'i cho ga slob dpon sdom pa bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: tsha tsha gdab pa'i rim pa
item.coloph: tsha tsha gdab pa'i rim pa slob dpon sdom pa bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: rab tu gnas pa'icho ga
item.coloph: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga slob dpon sdom pa bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: sbyin sreg gi cho ga
item.coloph: slob dpon sdom pa bzang pos mdzad pa sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs so

item.tib: thun mong gi dngos grub rin po che sgrub pa'i thabs kyi man ngag
item.coloph: thun mong gi dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi man ngag /slob dpon sdom pa bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: bla ma'i maN+Dala yi dam gyi cho ga
item.coloph: bla ma'i maN+Dala yi dam gyi cho ga 'bro lo tsA bas bsgyur ba rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs/ grub pa brnyes pa'i paN+Di ta chen po a dzi ta mi tra gup+tasa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shrI dza ga ta mi tra A nan+da dang / de nyid kyi zhabs kyi pad+mo'i rdul la spyi bos reg cing gsung gi bdud rtsi'i ro myong ba/ bod kyi lo tsA ba gnubs byams pa dpal gyi bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa'i man ngag khungs phyung ba/ slob dpon che po mi phaM sbas pas bsdus pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug shrI mi tra dang / gnubs lo tsA ba mai tri shrIsa bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig ma'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po rol pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ma hA shrI dza Ta ma tra A nan+da rA dza dang gnubs lo tsA ba mai tri shrIsa bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po shrI badz+ra kIrti zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal ral gcig ma'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dpal ral pa cig ma'i sgrub thabs 'khor gnod sbyin dang bcas pa rdzogs so/ /rje grub thob chen po'i thugs dam/ /gnubs lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: bsngo ba nor bu'i sgron ma zhes bya ba
item.coloph: rdo rje thogs pa'i bsngo ba nor bu'i sgron ma/ slob dpon mi pham zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta su b+ha shrI shAn+ti dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur pa'o

item.tib: dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa la bstod pa
item.coloph: bcom ldan 'das dpal ral pa gcig pa la bstod pa/ kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po bud+d+ha shrI b+ha dra dang bod kyi lo chung gnubs byams dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: rang gi sems ngal ga so ba'i man ngag tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: rnal 'byor pa rang gi sems ngal sos par byed pa'i man ngag tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba de kho na nyid rnal 'byor du mtshon par byed pa'i do ha rdzogs so/ /jo bo spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug las man ngag gi tshigs su bcad pa nyid dngos su gsan nas grub pa brnyes pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shrI dza ta mi trA nan+da dang / lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis dpal gu lang gser khang gi nags khrod aM ba ra pa ra ta'i bsil khang du bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rtogs pa brjod pa sum cu pa
item.coloph: rtogs pa brjod pa sum cu pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po mi tra dzo ki de nyid kyi spyan sngar gnubs lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: dpal kha sar pa Na yab yum gyi sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dpal 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi sgrub thabs/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shrI mi tra'i gdams pa rdzogs so/ /gnubs lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: dpal gnod sbyin spun gnyis kyi sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dpal gnod sbyin spun gnyis kyis sgrub thabs/ slob dpon a dzi ta mi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug mi tra A nan+da'i 'phrin las kyi lha'i rigs gnubs lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po'i sgrubs kyi snang ba zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dpal ldan rje btsun rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po'i sgrub thabs kyi snang ba rje btsun ma hi mas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA d+ha ra dang / yar lungs pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis dpal ldan sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: lnga bcu pa'i bshad pa
item.coloph: di ni rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po'i lnga bcu pa'i 'grel pa mdor bsdus pa ste/ kha che'i paN+Di ta dri med dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du mi chen lha rje me ga ling gis zhus shing / yar lungs ba shud kyi grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug bsgom pa'i rim pa
item.coloph: ku la lo ka nA tha'i byin brlabs dang rjes gnang bya ba'i rim pa kha che'i paN+Di ta bi ma la shrI'i zhal snga nas bris pa rdzogs so/ / sangs rgyas lnga yi rnam dag pa'i/ /ma rig pa yi rim pa las/ /dbang bskur byed pa'i rim pa yis/ /ye shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur/ /zhes rdo rje phreng ba las gsung pas/ /ma rig pa lnga bsal nas rig pa ye shes lnga rtogs par byed pas na rig pa'i dbang ngo / lo tsA ba blo brtan gyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rjes gnang bya ba'i rim pa
rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug sgrub pa'i thabs
item.coloph: rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug sgrub pa'i thabs/ /slob dpon b+g+riMgi ra bram zes mdzad pa 'jam dpl sgeg pas bsgyur pas bsgyur ba rdzogs sho

item.tib: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yi ge bgun pa'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dpal spyan ras gzigs yi ge bdun pa'i sgrub thabs/ /gnubs lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ /ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma grub pa'i rgyal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba
item.coloph: bcom ldan 'das mgon po tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i dbang bzhi bskur ba'i cho ga'i las khrigs 'chi med ye shes bdud rtsi'i bum pa zhes bya ba/ ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma grub pa'i rgyal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta zla ba bzang po dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba glan dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba
item.coloph: bcom ldan 'das mgon po tshe dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzang po yongs bzung zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta zla ba bzang po dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba glan dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur zhing zhus te dag par byas so

item.tib: tshe dpag tu med pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba
item.coloph: sbyin bsreg las kyi 'bras 'byin 'di/ /mkha' 'gro grub pa'i rgyal mos btsams/ /dge ba 'di yis 'gro ba kun/ /tshe dpag med pa rnyed 'gyur shog/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po wa la tsaN+Da bla ma dang / lo tsA ba glan dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dpa' bo rta mgrin sgrub pa'i thabs/ 'od dpag med kyis lung bstan pa'i/ /mkha' 'gro grub pa'i rgyal mos btsams/ dge bas rta mchog sku thobs shog /paN+Di ta zla ba bzang po dang glan chung dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing zhus dag go

item.tib: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa
item.coloph: drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyis 'grel pa bdud rtsi myur gu zhes bya ba/ dngos grub brnyes pa'i dza pa ri pas ba ri ri ba la man ngag tu zhasu pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta de ba pur+Na ma ti dang / lo tsA ba chos kyis bzang pos bsgrur ba'o

item.tib: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs 'khor lo chen po zhes bya ba
item.coloph: slob dpon chen po dza ba ri pas mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs 'khor lo chen po rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta de ba pur+Na ma ti dang / lo tsA ba dge slong chaso kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gzungs kyi sgrub thabs bdud rtsi thigs pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gzungs kyi sgrub thabs bdud rtsi thigs pa zhes bya ba/ nam gru'i rigs las byung ba dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon dzA ba ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bal po'i mkhan po de ba pur+Na ma ti dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs bdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dpal phyag na rdo rje'i bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ nam gru'i rigs las byung ba/ dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon chen po dzA ba ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bal po'i paN+Di ta de ba pur+Na ma ti dang /bod kyi lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: klu rigs bzhi'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: slob dpon dzA ba ri pas mdzad pa'i klu sgrub thabs rdzog so/ /bal po'i paN+Di ta de ba pur+Na ma ti dang / lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: gnod sbyin gyi sde rnams sbyong zhing sel ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: gnod sbyin gyi bsgrub pa'i thabs nam gru'i rigs las byung ba dngos grub brnyed pa'i slob dpon dzA ba ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bal po'i mkhan po de ba pur+Na ma ti dang / lo tsA ba ban de chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: yi dgas dang sha za dang grul bum dang srul po rnams rnam par sbyong zhing sel ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: nam gru'i rigs las byung ba'i dzA ba ri pas mdzad pa'i bdud bzlog pa'i cho ga rdzogs so/ /bal po'i bla ma de ba pur+Na ma ti dang / lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o/

item.tib: dpal phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gzungs kyi gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dpal phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gzungs kyi gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba'o/ nam gru'i rigs las byung ba dngos grub brnyes pa/ slob dpon bram ze'i btsun pa dzA ba ri pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bla ma de ba pur+Na ma ti dang / lo tsA ba she'u badz+ra de bas bsgyur ba las/ slad kyis bdag dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bal ma la shin tu legs par zhus te/ phan nu tsho bcos pa lags so

item.tib: rim pa drug pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: rim pa drug pa zhesa bya ba rtags gsal bar byed pa/ nam gru'i rigs las byung ba dngos grub brnyes pa dzA ba ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta de ba pur+Na ma ti dang chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: gsad pa bdud rtsi gso ba zhes bya ba
item.coloph: gsang ba gso ba'i cho ga rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta de ba pur+Na ma ti dang / lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: bdud rtsi 'o ma'i mchod pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: phyag na rdo rje'i mchod pa'i rim pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta de ba pur+Na ma ti dang lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: klu khro bos gsad pa'i phrin las zhes bya ba
item.coloph: slob dpon dzA ba ri pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa'i khro bos gsod pa'i phrin las paN+Di ta de ba pur+Na ma ti dang / lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang pos bcos pa'o

item.tib: klu rigs bzhi mnan pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba
item.coloph: klu rigs bzhi'i mnan pa nam gru'i rigs las byung ba'i dzA ba ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dpal phyag na rdo rje'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga nam gru'i rigs las byung ba dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon dzA ba ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta de ba pur+Na ma ti dang chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba
item.coloph: phyag na rdo rje'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba nam gru'i rigs las byung ba dngos sgrub brnyes pa'i slob dpon dzA ba ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta de ba pur+Na ma ti dang lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dpal phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga nam gru'i rigs las byung ba'i dngos grub brnyes pa slob dpon dzA ba ri pa'i zhal nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bal po'i mkhan po paN+Di ta de ba pur+Na ma ti dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur zhus te gtan la phan pa'o

item.tib: mdze nad kyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba
item.coloph: mdze nad kyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba/ nam gru'i rigs las byung ba/ dngos grub brnyes pa dzA ba ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta de ba pur+Na ma ti dang lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can 'khor lo chen po'i lha tshogs la bstod pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can 'khor lo chen po'i lha tshogs la bstod pa zhes bya ba/ nam gru'i rigs las dngos grub brnyes pa'i dzA ba ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po de ba pur+Na ma ti dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i bsrung ba zhes bya ba
item.coloph: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i bsrung ba zhes bya ba/ nam gru'i rigs las byung ba/ dngos grub brnyes pa dzA ba ri'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta de ba pur+Na ma ti dang / lo tsA ba she'u badz+ra de ba'i bsgyur/

item.tib: phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gnod sbyin drag po chen po rdo rje gnod sbyin me lce'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: slob dpon chen po 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i dngos grub brnyed pa de'i sku sprul nus pa phyag na rdo rjes mdzad pa rdo rje me lce'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa de kho na nyid snang ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shrI dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: slob dpon chen po phyag rgya'i dngos grub brnyes pa phyag na rdo rjes mdzad pa me lce'i phreng ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: gnod sbyin gyi sde lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs
item.coloph: lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa'i man ngag rdzogs so

item.tib: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs
item.coloph: slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs chen po rdzogs so

item.tib: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs
item.coloph: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs/ slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: lung bstan sbyor ba'i man ngag
item.coloph: slob dpon chen po b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /lo tsA ba tshul khrims gzhon nus bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: rdo rje las kyi tshogs rim par phye ba'i cho ga
item.coloph: rdo rje las kyi tshogs rim par phye ba'i cho ga/ slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /lo tsA ba khu pa bir ya dang /dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sbyor ka chen po'i cho ga
item.coloph: sbyor ka chen po'i man ngag /slob dpon chen po b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /dge slong tshul khrims gzhon nus bsgyur to

item.tib: phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gtor ma'i cho ga
item.coloph: slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga
item.coloph: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims gzhon nus bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: sbyin sreg kyi gi cho ga
item.coloph: sbyin sreg gi sbyor ka slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga
item.coloph: slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: maN+Dala gyi sbyor ka
item.coloph: slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa'i maN+Dala gyi sbyor ka rdzogs so

item.tib: las kyi rim pa mu tig phreng ba zhes bya ba
item.coloph: las kyi rim pa mu tig phreng ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje slob dpon bIR+Ya gu ba su tri'i zhal snga dang lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing zhus te/ dur khrod nags tshal du brgyud pa'i slob dpon la/ shin tu gsang zhing zhus ba'i don lags so

item.tib: phyag na rdo rje lce dbab kyi 'grel pa mu tig gi phreng ba
item.coloph: rdo rje lce babs kyi 'grel ba mu tig gi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rim pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po rgyal bu sprin gyi shugs can gyis mdzad pa'o/ slad kyi paN+Di ta dza ya A ka ra dang / lo tsA ba mar pas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o/

item.tib: rdo rje lce dbab pa'i sngags ni
item.coloph: lce dbab pa'i bya thabs rdzogs so

item.tib: rten 'brel gyi mthus bsrung ba'i thabs
item.coloph: rten 'brel gyi mthus bsrung ba rdzogs so

item.tib: phyag na rdo rje lce dbab kyi sngon du 'gro ba'i yan lag rnal 'byor gyi spyod lam brgyad pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: phyag na rdo rje lce dbab kyi sngon du 'gro ba'i yan lag /rnal 'byor gyi spyod lam brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon rgyal bu sprin gyi shugs can gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /slob dpon rgyal bu sprin gyi shugs can gyi rgyud dang mi 'gal bar mdzad pa'o/dza ya A ka ra dang /mar pa lo tsA bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/

item.tib: gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs
item.coloph: gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: khro bo rdo rje gtum po lha lnga pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
item.coloph: phyag na rdo rje gtum po lha lnga pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'phags pa klu grub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: phyag na rdo rje'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
item.coloph: phyag na rdo rje'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa klu grub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can dang bya khyung gi sgrub thabs
item.coloph: rdo rje skor gyi nang sgrub yid bzhin gyi nor bu pa zhes bya/ phyag na rdo rje'i zhal mngon sum du gzigs pa/ slob dpon las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po wa la tsan+d+ra dang / lo tsA ba glan chung dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: dpal phyag na rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: slob dpon las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa'i gsang ba thugs kyi phur gcing ma'o/ /paN+Di ta wa la tsan+d+ra dang / lo tsA ba tshul khrims kyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rig sngags bcad pa dang mnan pa'i cho ga
item.coloph: rigs sngags bcad pa dang mnan pa'i cho ga'o

item.tib: dpal phyag na rdo rje'i sbyin sreg mdor bsdus pa
item.coloph: slob dpon las kyis rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: klu gtor rgyas pa
item.coloph: bya khyung sa ma ya tan tra'i rgyud las btus pa/ lo tsA ba glan chung dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur ba'i klu gtor rgyas pa rdzogs so

item.tib: khro bo rdo rje gtum po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: gtum chung khra thog ma'i sgrub thabs/ rgyal po zla ba'i snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /lo tsA ba sgeg pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rdo rje khyung gi sgrub thabs
item.coloph: rdo rje khyung gi sgrub thabs pa'i man ngag rdzogs so/ /slob dpon rdo rje pad+masa mdzad pa'o/ /paN+Di ta sa'i snying po dang /lo tsA barma ban gyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rdo rje gtum po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzang po mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: rdo rje gtum po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzang po mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon las kyi rdo rje mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta zla ba bzang po dang / bod kyi lo tsA glan chung dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur pa'o

item.tib: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rnam par bzhad pa
item.coloph: 'phags pa gos sngon po can gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa rdzogs so/ /skye ba lnga brgyar blo rab sbyangs/ sngags kyi theg pa'i bstan bcos 'di/ dbu ma'i lta bar yang dag nges/ mkhas btsun rnams kyi yongs su gzung / sgrol ma gsal ba zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa dge slong klu'i byang chub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba
item.coloph: rtog pa thams cad bsdu pa'i sgron ma/ slob dpon chen po shrI b+ha tras mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: 'phags pa gos sngon po can zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher bshad pa
item.coloph: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi rgyud rgya cher bshad pa/ slob dpon chen po mchog rab snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so/

item.tib: lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher bshad pa
item.coloph: rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje be con gos sngon po can gyi rgyud gu ya ru pa'i zhal snga nas ni legs bsgyur bas/ mkha' 'gro'i gling nas dum bu brgyad du legs bris pa/ de yi bshad rgyud 'bum phrag phyed dang gsum stong las ni phyung ba yin/ rtog drug pa'i rgyud rdzogs so

item.tib: de kho na nyid sgron ma zhes bya ba phyag na rdo rje'i sgrub thabs thams cad rdzogs pa'i rgyan
item.coloph: kha de kho na nyid sgron ma zhes bya ba'i rgyan/ bal ma'i man ngag rgyun ma chad pa/ de kho na nyid nyi zla snang ba zhes bya ba'i grub thabs chen po dge slong klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta gu ru pad+ma 'byung gnas dang / lo tsA ba glang dpal gyi seng ges bsgyur ro/ /slad kyis kyang paN+Di ta rgya gar phyag nas sgra rang 'gyur du bsgyur ro/ bi las badz+ra las bla ma sman btsun khros pa la gnang / des dngos la gnang pa lags so

item.tib: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga thams cad rdzogs pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dpal gos sngon can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ slob dpon nA gA rdzu nas mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: sngags kyi rgyan gyi sgrub thabs
item.coloph: ngags kyi rgyan nA gA rdzu nas mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: rab tu gnas pa'i rgyan
item.coloph: dge slong nA gA rdzu nas mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: gtor ma'i rgyan
item.coloph: gtor ma'i rgyan gyi man ngag dge slong klu'i byang chub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dam tshig gi rgyan
item.coloph: dam tshig gi rgyan rdzogs so

item.tib: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dge slong klu'i byang chub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs kyi man ngag rgya cher bshad pa zhes bya ba
sngags pa rgyan gyi 'grel pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: sngags kyi rgyan gyi 'grel pa/ mchog rab kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bla ma dam pa'i man ngag snyan nas snyan du thob pa rdzos so

item.tib: dam tshig rgyan gyi rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dam tshig rgyan gyis 'grel pa mchog rab ma rdzogs so/ /zangs dkar tshul khrims gzhon nus bsgyur ba lags so

item.tib: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs kyi man ngag rgya cher bshad pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: mchog rab snying po rtsa ba'i man ngag pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa rdzogs so

item.tib: de kho na nyid sgron ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs pa
item.coloph: gos sngon go 'phang myur 'thob shog/

item.tib: de kho na nyid kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa
item.coloph: de kho na nyid sgron ma'i 'grel pa/ slob dpon dpa' bos byin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: rgyud ma lus pa'i don nges par skul bar byed pa dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: lha dang lha min la sogs pa ma lus pas/ zhabs kyi pad+ma bzung la me tog gis pheng bas mchod pa dpal mgon po bde ba chen po pad+ma badz+rasa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na paN+Di ta dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: thabs dang shes rab rnam par gtan la dbab pa sgrub pa
item.coloph: thabs dang shes rab rnam par gtan la dbab pa'i sgrub pa slob dpon chen po yan lag med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta chen po shIn+ta b+ha dra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 'gos tsA ba 'gos lha btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: ye shes grub pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dpal dbu brgyan nas byung ba/ ye shes grub pa zhe ba ba'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon in+d+ra b+hU tis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rin chen bzang pos bsgyur/ slad kyis nag tshos bcos so

item.tib: gnyis su med par grub pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: gnyis su med par grub thabs zes bya ba 'di ni u rgyan gyi che ba rnal 'byor gdan gyi sgrub pa'i lha'i gnas nas byung ba bcom ldan 'das ma lak+ShI'i zhal snga nas byung ba rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal u rgyan nas byung ba gsang ba'i gsang ba chen po de kho na nyid kyi man ngag
item.coloph: dpal u rgyan nas byung ba gsang ba chen po de kho na nyid kyi man ngag ces bya ba slob dpon chen po dA ri ka pas mdzad pa rdzog so

item.tib: dngos po gsal ba'i rjes su 'gro ba'i de kho na nyid grub pa
item.coloph: dngos po gsal ba'i rjes su 'gro ba'i de kho na nyid grub pa zhes bya ba/ lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor ma tsi tos mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta chen po zhi ba bzang po dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: dpal lhan cig skyes pa grub pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i rgyud kyi lhan cig skyes pa grub pa las/ lhan cig skyes pa bstan pa slob dpon chen po dpal Do b+hi he ru kas zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: do ha mdzod kyi glu
item.coloph: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal sa ra ha chen po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa do ha mdzad ces bya ba de kho na nyid rnal du mtshon pa don dom pa'i yi ge rdzogs so

item.tib: phyag rgya bzhi gtan la dbab pa
item.coloph: phyag rgya bzhi gtan la dbab pa slob dpon chen po klu sgrub snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bla ma d+ha ri shrI dz+nyA na'i zhabs dang / bod kyi lo tsA barma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: shes rab ye shes gsal ba
item.coloph: shes rab ye shes gsal ba zhes bya ba/ mkhas pa chen po de ba tsan+d+rasa zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta badz+ra pA Ni dang / lo tsA ba d+harma kIrtisa bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: gnas pa bsdus pa
item.coloph: gnas pa bsdus pa rdzogs so/ /slob dpon chen po dpal ldan lhan cig skyes pa'i rdo rje mdzad pa/ bla ma d+ha ri shrI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo tsA barma ban tshes 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o/ phyis bar ston gyis zhus nas bla ma rgya gar ba dang /mtshur lo tsA bas dpe phyi mo la gtugs te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rim pa'i man ngag ces bya ba
item.coloph: bsam gyi mi khyab pa zhes bya ba phyag rgya chen po thob pa'i slob dpon tog rtse zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bde ba'i myu gu dang 'gos kyi 'gyur ro

item.tib: lta ba ngan pa sel ba zhes bya ba
item.coloph: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po nges par sbyangs pa/ gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa lta ba ngan pa sel ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /mkhan po bla ma badz+ra pA Ni'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo tsA mtshur ston ye shes 'byung gnas kyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: dbu ma drug pa
item.coloph: dbu ma drug pa zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa me tris pa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bla ma badz+ra pA Ni dang / nags tshos bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: lta ba ngan pa sel ba'i 'dran pa
item.coloph: lta ba ngan pa sel ba'i dka' 'grel lam dran pa/ dpal ldan nges par sbyangs pa gnyis su med pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /badz+ra pA Ni dang mtshur (ston)gyis bsgyur ba yin no

item.tib: lhan cig skyes pa drug pa
item.coloph: lhan cig skyes pa drug pa bla ma mai tri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bla ma badz+ra pA Ni dang mtshur (ston) gyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rmi lam nges par bstan pa
item.coloph: rmi lam nges par bstan pa slob dpon gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bla ma badz+ra pA Ni dang dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: sgyu ma nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: sgyu ma nges par bstan pa slob dpon gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po badz+ra pA Ni dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rab tu mi gnas pa gsal bar ston pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: rab tu mi gnas pa gsal bar ston pa/ slob dpon gnyis med rdo rje mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: de kho na nyid bcu pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: de kho na nyid bcu pa/ slob dpon gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bla ma phyag na rdo rje dang / mtshur ston gyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: zung du 'jug pa rab tu gsal ba bstan pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: zung du 'jug pa rab tu gsal ba bstan pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon a ba d+hU tis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /badz+ra pA Ni dang / nags tshos bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: dga' bcugs lnga pa
item.coloph: dga' bcugs lnga pa/ slob dpon mai tri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bla ma phyag na'i zhal snga nas dang / lo tsA ba rma ban gyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: mi phyed pa lnga pa
item.coloph: mi phyed pa lnga pa slob dpon mai tri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po badz+ra pA Ni dang lo tsA ba rma ban gyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: bde ba chen po gsal ba
item.coloph: bde ba chen po gsal ba slob dpon a ba d+hU ti pa dpal gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bla ma badz+ra pA Ni dang / rma ban gyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: de kho na nyid rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba
item.coloph: de kho na nyid rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon a ba d+hU ti pa gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /nags tsho tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: de kho na nyid rab tu bstan pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: de kho na nyid rab tu bstan pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon gnyid med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta badz+ra pA Ni dang/ lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i phyag rgya rnam par bshad pa
item.coloph: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i phyag rgya rnam par bshad pa slob dpon gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po phyag na rdo rje dang / lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: dbang gi dgos pa mdor bsdus pa
item.coloph: dbang gi dgos pa mdor bsdus pa mkhas pa chen po nges par sbyangs pa gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma badz+ra pA Ni'i zhal snga nas dang / lo tsA ba mtshur ston gyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: dbang gi bya ba mdor bsdus pa
item.coloph: dbang gi cho ga mdor bsdus pa rdzogs so/ /dpal gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa'o

item.tib: rang bzhin lnga ma
item.coloph: di ni rdo rje sems dpa' rang bzhin lnga pa/ dpal gnyis med rdor rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /a mr-i de bas zhus te gsol ba btab nas brtsams

item.tib: thabs dang shes rab brtse ba lnga pa
item.coloph: thabs dang she rab brtse ba lnga pa slob dpon a ba d+hU tI pa gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjesa mdzad pa rdzogs so

item.tib: do ha ni dhi zhes bya ba de kho na nyid kyi man ngag
item.coloph: do hA ti zhes bya de kho na nyid kyi man ngag rdzogs so/ /a ba d+hU ti pas mdzad pa/ rje btsun d+hi ri shrI dz+nyA nas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: theg pa chen po nyi shu pa
item.coloph: theg pa chen po nyi shu pa slob dpon gnyis med rdor rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /pa ri pa ta pradz+nyA sha ra sa ma d+h+ya na/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po de ba ka ra tsan+d+ra dang bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya brtson 'grus kyis bsgyur cing gtan la dbab pa'o

item.tib: yid la mi byed pa ston pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: yid la mi byed pa ston pa bdag med pa gsal ba rdzogs so/ slob dpon chen po gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po badz+ra pA Ni dang bod kyi lo tsA ba gnyan chung gis bcos pa rdzogs so

item.tib: de kho na nyid theg pa chen po nyi shu pa
item.coloph: a ba d+hU ti pa gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rje btsun d+hi ri shrI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas dang lo tsA ba seng kar shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur ba'o/

item.tib: gsang ba dam pa
item.coloph: gsang ba dom pa rdzogs so

item.tib: dbang nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dbang nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba slob dpon rgyal ba mai tri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na paN+Di ta dang/ lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur

item.tib: dbang bskur ba nges par bstan pa'i dka' 'grel
item.coloph: dbang bskur ba nges par bstan pa'i bka' 'grel/ slob dpon dga' ba skyong gis mdzad pa rdzog so/ /sa man+ta b+ha dra dang / nag tshos bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: de kho na nyid bcu pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa
item.coloph: de kho na nyid bcu pa'i rgya cher bshad pa paN+Di ta chen po slob dpon lhan cig skyes pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po badz+ra pAN+Di las mnyan te/ slad kyi paN+Di ta kA l+ya varma dang / lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong dz+nyA na a kA ra mtshur gyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rdo rje'i tshig ces bya ba
item.coloph: rdo rje slob dpon badz+ra pA Ni'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/ rdo rje'i tshig rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang / lo tsA ba mtshur ston dge slong dz+nya na A ka ras bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: do ha mdzod kyi dka' 'grel
item.coloph: do ha mdzod kyi dka' 'grel slob dpon chen po dpal gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar lho phyogs yul ko sa lar sku 'khrungs pa'i rnal 'byor pa chen po shrI bai ro tsa na badz+rasa bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: mi zad pa'i gter mdzod yongs su gang ba'i glu zhes bya ba gnyug ma'i de nyid rab tu ston pa'i rgya cher bshad pa
item.coloph: mi zad pa'i gter mdzod yongs su gang ba'i glu zhes bya ba'i rgya cher bshad pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyung chen po dpal sa ra ha pa'i dgongs pa mkhas par grags pa dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA na kIrtisa rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

item.tib: do ha mdzod kyi dka' 'grel zhes bya ba
item.coloph: do ha mdzod kyi dka' 'grel slob dpon chen po thar pa'i 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po rgyal ba'i lha dang / rgya lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: phyag rgya bzhi'i rgya cher 'grel pa rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba
